main.name: Janno Tabamo
main.description: I have over 4 years of experience in Software development. I developed backend solutions and frontend/mobile applications for companies and startups to make their idea into a solid business
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.techMessage: I'm a tinkerer and am always interested in playing around with new technologies but these are the ones that have really won me over

education.school: Mindanao University of Scient and Technology
education.description: This was the time that I honed my experience in software development while enjoying my college life.

work.title: Full-Stack Engineer
work.description: Reporting to the CEO I am responsible for managing the frontend/backend architecture, implemented continous integration and deployment, quality assurance, documentation, and release management.

favoriteTech.name: Git
favoriteTech.description: I use Git for all of my projects so far. I have used Git for version control in my own personal projects or in my teams.

favoriteTech.name: Angular
favoriteTech.description: I used Angular for almost 85% of my projects, from building web applications to creating mobile applications.

favoriteTech.name: ReactJS
favoriteTech.description: I am fairly new to React and really did not like it at first. But when I try to give it a shot, that's the time I already fall in love with it.

favoriteTech.name: Nativescript
favoriteTech.description: I used it because it's truly a native cross-platform framework and it was built using javascript, Angular and ReactJS are also supported!

favoriteTech.name: NodeJS
favoriteTech.description: This tech helps me to build server side application using it's awesome frameworks.

favoriteTech.name: ExpressJS
favoriteTech.description: This is the first framework of NodeJS I used when I'm building server side applications and this is still my favorite.

favoriteTech.name: NestJS
favoriteTech.description: This is my all time favorite in all of the server side frameworks that I used. This was built using Typescript and it also supports ExpressJS and Fastify.

favoriteTech.name: Bootstrap 4
favoriteTech.description: I use Bootstrap more often than not when designing the layout for my sites. It is the framework I am most familiar with and can therefore design more quickly than with others.

projects.title: Pathfinding Visualizer

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
